Faezeh Siavashi

Doctor of Software Eng|Web Engineer|Startup team Leader

Verification and automated testing of computer systems and programs, although broad, capture my research interests most accurately. Enhancing verification methods and developing advanced testing techniques for time-critical systems, Web services, RESTfull APIs, and autonomous devices are among my top research areas.
